casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 3, 2009

[Cite as 12/03/2009 Case Announcements #2, 2009-Ohio-6330.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-0892. State ex rel. Lohn v. Medina Cty. Bd. of Cty. Commrs.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus. Upon consideration of relator’s motion to vacate the order granting a request for extension of time,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted in part. Respondents’ merit brief shall be filed no later than December 11, 2009.
